Race.SpecificTitle: PW Parish Council -- 1 Mill (Operation & Maintenance Tax) - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Forensic Medical Facilities)
(Operation and Maintenance Tax)

Summary:  Authority to levy and collect a property tax of one (1) mill for ten (10) years, beginning with calendar year 2010 for improving, providing, maintaining or operating the Jefferson Parish Forensic Medical Facilities and the Jefferson Parish Coroner's Office, the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax being $2,600,000.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy and collect a tax of one (1) mill on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with year 2010, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax being $2,600,000 for the purpose of improving, providing, maintaining or operating Jefferson Parish Forensic Medical Facilities and the Jefferson Parish Coroner's Office?

Race.SpecificTitle: Plantation Estates Subd. Spec. -- Annual Security Enhancement Tax - PC
Race.SummaryText:
Plantation Estates Subdivision Special District Proposition

Summary:  Authorization for the Plantation Estates Subdivision Special District, Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") to levy an annual security enhancement tax beginning in the year 2011 against each parcel of improved immovable property listed and/or assessed on the tax rolls of the Parish of Jefferson and located in the District to be used for the purpose of purchasing, acquiring, constructing and improving, or leasing, maintaining and operating machinery and equipment and other facilities to be used, and paying other expenses incurred and/or contracting for services to be rendered in connection with providing security enhancement services for the District. The estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the security enhancement tax is $113,190.
Race.FullText: Shall Plantation Estates Subdivision Special District, Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy and collect an annual security enhancement tax, beginning in the year 2011, in the amount of $353 in each of the years 2011 to 2013, inclusive; in the amount of $426 in each of the years 2014 to 2016, inclusive; and in the amount of $500 in each of the years 2017 to 2020, inclusive, against each parcel of improved immovable property listed and/or assessed on the tax rolls of the Parish of Jefferson and located in the District for the purpose of purchasing, acquiring, constructing and improving, or leasing, maintaining and operating machinery and equipment and other facilities to be used, and paying other expenses incurred and/or contracting for services to be rendered in connection with providing security enhancement services for the District. The estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the security enhancement tax is $113,190?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 7 -- 25 Mills (renew) - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 7 Proposition

Summary:  Authority to levy and collect a property tax of twenty-five (25) mills for ten (10) years beginning with 2010, in lieu of a property tax approved at an election held on July 20, 2002 in the District, for acquiring, constructing, improving, providing, maintaining or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $3,361,000.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 7, Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana be authorized to levy and collect a tax of twenty-five (25) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning in the year 2010, in lieu of a property tax approved at an election held on July 20, 2002 in the District, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $3,361,000, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, providing, maintaining or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment within and for the District?
